shortDescription: Authenticated (author or higher user role) Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability in ideasToCode Enable SVG, WebP & ICO Upload plugin <= 1.0.1 at WordPress.
vulnerabilityName: ideastocode enable_svg\,_webp_\&_ico_upload Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
